Body:
assertion = 'A_FAKE_ASSERTION'
challenge, verifier = self.client.generate_pkce_challenge()
self.assertEqual(sorted(challenge), ['code_challenge', 'code_challenge_method']
    )
self.assertEqual(sorted(verifier), ['code_verifier'])
code = self.client.authorize_code(assertion, **challenge)
self.assertEqual(code, 'qed')
req_body = json.loads(_decoded(responses.calls[0].request.body))
self.assertEqual(req_body, {'assertion': assertion, 'client_id': self.
    client.client_id, 'state': AnyStringValue(), 'code_challenge':
    challenge['code_challenge'], 'code_challenge_method': challenge[
    'code_challenge_method']})
responses.activate
